10 (0) REM TEST FOR PRECISION OPTION
100 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 7"
110 (1) OPTION PRECISION 7
120 (1) LET A = 1 / 7
130 (1) FOR I = 1 TO 10
140 (10) PRINT A
150 (10) LET A = A / 10
160 (10) NEXT I
200 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION 16"
210 (1) OPTION PRECISION 16
220 (1) LET A = 1 / 7
230 (1) FOR I = 1 TO 12
240 (12) PRINT A
250 (12) LET A = A / 10
260 (12) NEXT I
300 (1) PRINT "VALUES WITH PRECISION INFINITE"
310 (1) OPTION PRECISION "INFINITE"
320 (1) LET A = 1 / 7
330 (1) FOR I = 1 TO 12
340 (12) PRINT A
350 (12) LET A = A / 10
360 (12) NEXT I
999 (1) END
